scripts.update-nutrient-version: VERSION=$(npm view @nutrient-sdk/viewer version) && sed -i.bak "s|https://cdn\.cloud\.pspdfkit\.com/pspdfkit-web@[^/]*/nutrient-viewer\.js|https://cdn.cloud.pspdfkit.com/pspdfkit-web@$VERSION/nutrient-viewer.js|g" index.html && rm index.html.bak && echo "Updated to version $VERSION"
